first_run.content:
#!/bin/sh

. /home/app/venv/bin/activate
 
python3.7 -m pip install --upgrade pip 
cd /home/app/software

/home/home_dir/.local/bin/django-admin startproject $CONTAINER_NAME

cat /home/app/software/site.settings >> /home/app/software/$CONTAINER_NAME/$CONTAINER_NAME/settings.py

template_files.content:
<VirtualHost *:8000>

    Alias /static /home/app/static
    <Directory /home/app/static>
        Require all granted
    </Directory>

    Alias /uploaded /home/fs/persist
    <Directory /home/fs/persist>
        Require all granted
    </Directory>

WSGIPassAuthorization On
WSGIScriptAlias / /home/app/software/_Engines_Builder(engine_name)/_Engines_Builder(engine_name)/wsgi.py

WSGIDaemonProcess software python-path=/home/app/software/_Engines_Builder(engine_name):/home/app/venv/:/home/home_dir/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages
    LogLevel info
    <Directory /home/app/software/_Engines_Builder(engine_name)/_Engines_Builder(engine_name) >
        WSGIProcessGroup software
        WSGIApplicationGroup %{GLOBAL}
        <Files wsgi.py>
            Require all granted
        </Files>
    </Directory>
</VirtualHost>

script.content:
#!/bin/sh

. /home/app/venv/bin/activate
 
python3.7 -m pip install --upgrade pip 

if test -f /home/app/core_modules
 then
   for module in `cat /home/app/core_modules`
    do
     echo Updating $module 
      python3.7 -m pip  install --upgrade  $module
    done
fi
